channel.title: Can somebody post a tut on turning a client into a .jar file?
channel.description:
The title says it all. I'm looking to turn my client into a .jar file. I know theres a program out there but i forget what it is, and don't really remember the steps on doing it.
So if anyone would post a TuT link, or paste an already made one below. That would be great!!!
BTW: I have looked through the forums, i couldn't find one =/ So don't think i haven't tried.

item.title: Can somebody post a tut on turning a client into a .jar file?
item.dc:creator: @Bloody_Wolf Bloody Wolf
item.description:
@Bloody_Wolf wrote:

Sorry but thats of no help, thanks though.

Come on guys i know someone knows what im talking about.

A program thats takes my Client folder and turns it into a .jar file so nobody can tamper with the files.

Read full topic
item.source: Can somebody post a tut on turning a client into a .jar file?

item.title: Can somebody post a tut on turning a client into a .jar file?

And if that does not help, try this one : http://jsmooth.sourceforge.net/index.php

hope i helped
